description: Is separator missing from context? Is description missing from context? Should required be is_required in context? Branded variable i.e. the combination of a variable (a physical quantity) and a branded suffix (information about how the variable was sampled in time and space). For underlying details and logic, please see [Taylor et al., 2025](https://docs.google.com/document/d/19jzecgymgiiEsTDzaaqeLP6pTvLT-NzCMaq-wu-QoOc/edit?pli=1&tab=t.0).
